house Speaker Kevin McCarthy is leading

Arizona and take an aerial tour Kevin
McCarthy made securing the southern

traveled to El Paso Texas to call for
the resignation of Homeland Security
secretary Alejandro mayorcas McCarthy
and other Republicans have repeatedly

the White House has accused Republicans
